name: Adult Wind Dragon
description: The Adult Wind Dragon is an imposing creature embodying the chaotic forces of wind and lightning. It has a sleek, powerful form with sharp features that suggest agility and ferocity. Its scales shimmer in a variety of colors reminiscent of storm clouds.
memorable: The dragon's ability to unleash devastating area attacks with its Tempest Breath and create gale-force winds around it, influencing combat dynamics.
goals: To assert its dominance in the skies and terrorize weaker creatures in its territory.
relations: This dragon may be encountered alongside other elemental creatures or as a rival to other dragons.
environment: Commonly found in stormy mountains or places where winds are fierce.
strengths: Immunity to lightning and resistance to cold damage enhance its durability against elemental attacks. Its tactical abilities with storms during encounters give it an edge.
weaknesses: While chaotic, it may lack strategic coordination compared to more lawful creatures.
attacks: Utilizes multiattack to intimidate foes, employing a combination of Bite, Claw, and Tail attacks, alongside its Frightful Presence to demoralize opponents.
most_powerful_ability: The Tempest Breath, unleashing a powerful blast that can damage, displace, and knock down enemies while extinguishing flames.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet and a passive perception of 22, allowing it to detect opponents effectively.
skills: Exhibits exceptional agility and presence with skill proficiencies in Acrobatics and Intimidation, as well as notable perception and stealth skills.
additional_information: Freedom of Movement allows it to ignore difficult terrain.
Legendary Resistance allows it to succeed on failed saving throws.
Storm Sight enables it to see through fog, mist, and clouds.
Whirling Winds creates defensive gale-force winds around it.
Can take legendary actions, providing versatile combat options.
